ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Wanna head out
together again today?
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Oh, I almost forgot! This is for you!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2101_02_10: I found it on one of my walks. You can have it!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2102_02_10:
I’m so glad! I kept it for you because I figured
you’d like it!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
Ta-da! It’s a present for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2103_02_10: Hee hee... I hope you like it...
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2103_03_10: If I find any other good stuff, I’ll gift it to you!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I want to hear all your stories,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I have so many things I want to talk
about with you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Where should I start?
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Whoa! Thank you! I’ll take good care of it!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2301_01_10:
Oh, wow! It’s exactly what I wanted! Thank you
so much!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Next time, I’ll be sure to return the favor and get
you something extra cool!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2402_01_10: OK! See you later! I had fun talking with you!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2401_01_10: I had a great time! Let’s talk again soon!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
If the weather is nice, we should go on a
walk together!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
It’s amazing that you get to be in charge of such a
beautiful space!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8001_0701_02_10: I feel like I’m in your super-secret base!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
I’ve been noticing something during my walks...
There sure are a lot of star symbols here on Pasio,
aren’t there?
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
They look cute, like a Staryu! This island was
built by Lear, so I wonder if it’s his family crest
or something.
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
I keep a large doll in my secret base back
in Hoenn.
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
I couldn’t keep it in my house because it was too
big... But it’s so cute!
ch0126_00_haruka_salon/8003_0701_03_10: I also have a small Skitty doll in my room at home!
